about_the_game:
The Russian Village Simulator add-on includes 32 unique music tracks that were written especially for this game. Each track was created from scratch to fully match the atmosphere of the Russian village.

Current tracks present in the game.

The tracks are provided in WAV format, which is one of the highest quality sound recording formats available. This means that each track has high clarity and accuracy of sound, which allows you to fully immerse yourself in the musical world of the game.

Each track has its own uniqueness and unique style. It can be melodic folk music with the use of folk instruments, traditional songs or even modern tracks with elements of Russian musical culture. The variety of genres allows players to enjoy different musical moods and create the atmosphere of an authentic Russian village.

Each track is approximately 2.5 to 4.5 minutes long, allowing players to enjoy the music throughout the game. The tracks can be used as background music during gameplay or used in certain scenes of the game to emphasize moods and events.

As a result, the Russian Village Simulator add-on offers players 32 high-quality music tracks in WAV format, which will help to create the atmosphere of an authentic Russian village and immerse into the game world to the full depth.
